description:
With some divine intervention, Seiji and Yuzu are off to hell to see if they can return Guri to normal. With Coraly`s help they attempt to disguise themselves as demons but the jig is up when they happen to run into Shikimi as she wanders the streets. As they are chased by the demon police, Akane shows up to makes a half-hearted attempt to return Guri to her senses. When that fails, she attempts to drag Seiji back home. Yuzu finally convinces Seiji to talk to Guri to let prove to her that he does actually care about her but will it be enough? Will the real Guri ever come back?
Source: crunchyroll
